alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 23 at 11:51AM EST until December 24 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Higher Elevations of Fayette and Higher Elevations of Westmoreland Counties. In West Virginia, Eastern Preston, Eastern Tucker, Preston, Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston, and Western Tucker Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
